DataElement.preferredName: Exposure as Collected Domain Radiation Therapy Type Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text field that specifies the other type of radiation therapy received if other is selected from the type of radiation therapy list of values.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Exposure as Collected Domain Radiation Therapy Type
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: This interventions domain model reflects protocol-specified study treatment administrations, as collected.:Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
